channel.title: neEd HeLP
channel.description:
I need to add a new shop..
I completely forgot how to do it, and I cant find it in my old messages...
What I actualy did was remove a shop I didnt really need to make a new shop, but IDK what NPC is running it.
How do I find that out?

item.title: neEd HeLP
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

easiest way is to download a shop maker.
then all ya have to do is type in the normal isntead of the full code

downlaod section if ur gunna if not

first ya have to creat the shop in ur shop.cfg
im guessing you allready no that part.
and im guessing you allready got your npc spawned lol.

then go into client.java and search wanneshop
about 6 times (matters on the sorce)
then ya wanna add this in.[code]

			} else if (NPCID == NPC ID) { //NPC NAME						PutNPCCoords = true; 
				WanneShop = Shop ID; //Shop name

[/code]
edit it to the shops information.
and at it at the end just before

} else if (NPCID == 1 || NPCID == 2 || NPCID == 3 || NPCID == 4 || NPCID == 5 || NPCID == 6) { //THEIVING MAN & WOMEN

Read full topic
